name: Escape from "Curse Cave" [TRIJAM #200]
description:
This is my first Game Jam AND Trijam submission!
The theme of the jam was "Expect the Unexpected"

Escape the cave by managing your way around the obstacles and experience the unexpected effects of the strange curse of  God "Pacul"

The game is nowhere near polished, it was a bit hard to rush a game in 3 hours so I'm not happy with the overall quality and gameplay but It was a good and fun experience

CONTROLS:

  • Movement - Arrow Keys
  • Jump - Z
  • Shoot - X
